com.sendev.databasemanager.contracts

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sendev.databasemanager.contracts.Database
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DatabaseContract
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FilenameDatabase, HostnameDatabase

    public abstract class Database
extends java.lang.Object
implements DatabaseContract

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.sql.Connection connection
      Represents our current database connection, this is used to send queries to the database, as well as fetch, and persist data.
      protected DatabaseManager dbm 
      protected int lastUpdate
      Represents a unix timestamp of the last time we communicated with the database.
      protected java.util.Map<java.sql.PreparedStatement,StatementContract> preparedStatements
      Represents our prepared query statements and their statement type, allowing us to quickly render and compile statements.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean close()
      Closes the database connection.
      java.sql.Connection getConnection()
      Returns the current database connection, if the connection is not open/active, it will attempt to open the connection for you.
      int getLastUpdateCount()
      Get the unix timestamp of the last time the class communicated with the database.
      protected abstract boolean initialize()
      Initialize the database abstraction, this should be called by the open method if it's necessary.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Long> insert(java.sql.PreparedStatement query)
      Stores data in the database from the given prepared statement, this will return a list of ids from the inserted rows.

      Stores data in the database from the given query, this will return a list of ids from the inserted rows.

      Checks to see if the database connection is still valid.
